original_title: Flogging Molly: Live at the Greek Theatre
overview: 2010 live release from the Irish-flavored Punks. This set contains Flogging Molly's epic performance at the Greek Theatre, Los Angeles on September 12th 2009. The DVD features a 20 song full concert, seven music videos, outtakes, back stage footage and candid interviews.
title: Flogging Molly: Live at the Greek Theatre
